name: Overload Gig Store
description: A simple virtual storefront web application, built using Vanilla CSS for design, Vanilla JS for interactivity, and deployed via Netlify. Overload Gig Store was created to showcase the merchandise of each October Praise that happens every year at First United Methodist, Bancal, Guagua, Pampanga.

name: Barangay Management and Information System
description: A desktop application I developed to further hone my programming skills while addressing real-world community needs. The project simplifies the management of barangay resident records and automates the processing of requested documents. Key features include tracking of male and female residents, active voters, and households; resident information management; documentation of barangay issues such as blotters; and automated document generation using predefined templates.

name: Enrollment Management System
description: My first-ever project, developed during my 1st year in college, focused on automating the student enrollment process. It streamlined key tasks such as enrolling students, assigning teachers, and tracking student balances. Through this project, I gained valuable experience in writing database queries, applying Object-Oriented Programming, and implementing business rules within a system.
